rows.label: qev230101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Er, hello? Yes, welcome to the Shimmer & Savvy
Financial Group. I take it you're here to accept our
exchange request, is that right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230101_MSG0002
rows.name:
At your current exchange rate, I can give you 10,000
credits in return for 10,000 units of miranium.
That's fair, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230101_MSG0003
rows.name: So, er, let's carry out the transaction, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230101_SEL0021
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev230101_MSG0004
rows.name:
And here are 10,000 credits for for you.
Come see us again soon, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230101_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh! Well then, next time, perhaps?
We're always looking for miranium, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev230101_MSG0006
rows.name:
You don't seem to have enough...miranium?
We need a full 10,000 units, okay?[ST:wait ]
